message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize your business operations. This cutting-edge solution is priced at $900000, reflecting its exceptional capabilities and the value it can bring to your company.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this price is more in line with the value I can expect to receive from the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your input. In order to better align with your expectations while still reflecting the true value of our product, we propose a revised price of $825000. We believe this offers a fair compromise between the value provided and your budget considerations.
Thank you for the revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $750000. Would you be willing to consider a price of $775000? I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offers.

I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Bob. Considering the value of our product and the ongoing negotiations, we would like to propose a price of $800000. This reflects a compromise that maintains the product's value while addressing your budgetary concerns.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $775000. I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $785000? I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer the product at $795000. This price reflects a balance between the product's value and your budget, aiming to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction.

I'm getting close to walking away, Alice. I think we're getting close to a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $790000?

Considering the ongoing dialogue and your latest offer, we've decided to propose a price of $792500. This reflects a slight adjustment that aims to honor the value of the product while addressing your budgetary constraints.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Alice. I've already stretched my budget as far as I can. I'm going to have to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm willing to meet you at $790000 one last time. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $1500000.
